name: Loop-E-Mart
description:
This is a submission for Ludum Dare 47.

Theme: Stuck in a loop

Loop-E-Mart

Decide your loop before each shift. 

At the start of each day you will decide your loop, which will be repeated for the rest of the day.

Clients will come to the store with a list of products they wish to buy. They will look around, find them and try to pay. If they wait for too long, they will get angry and leave.
Manage your resources, time and make the most of your daily loop!
